articles.description: The ASX 200 slipped as much as 1% on Monday and closed 0.9% down at 6697.2, easing from Friday's near 11-month high.
articles.content:
But only a handful of local companies finished Mondays session in front as the benchmark index tracked a declining US futures market to a close of 6697.2, falling 0.9 per cent.
ACY securities chief … [+1355 chars]
